task_description: NPS and Feedback Collection System - Integrated NPS surveys and feedback collection triggered at key moments (after first successful deployment, monthly, after issues resolved). Data feeds into product improvement.

patterns.redux_slice: Redux Toolkit slices use createSlice and createAsyncThunk. Slices must be registered in web/src/store/index.js
patterns.dialog_component: Radix UI Dialog wrapper exists in web/src/components/ui/dialog.jsx. Import Dialog, DialogContent, DialogHeader, DialogTitle, DialogDescription, DialogFooter
patterns.sqlalchemy_model: SQLAlchemy models inherit from src.config.database.Base. Use Column types from sqlalchemy. Add indexes for frequently queried columns
patterns.fastapi_route: FastAPI routes use APIRouter with prefix and tags. Pydantic schemas in src/api/v1/schemas/. Dependencies in src/api/v1/dependencies.py
patterns.migrations: SQL migrations stored in ./migrations/ directory. Simple .sql files, not Alembic

existing_implementations.description: Found existing auth flow, dialog components, SQLAlchemy models, and FastAPI routes to use as patterns
